attributes.title: Percentage Field
attributes.readMe:
A flexible percentage field that displays numeric values as a percentage (0-100%). Supports multiple visual styles:

**Visual Styles:**
- `visualStyle: 'bar'` - Horizontal progress bar (default)
- `visualStyle: 'circle'` - Circular/radial progress indicator

**Bar Styles:**
- `barStyle: 'gradient'` - Gradient colors based on value thresholds (red→orange→yellow→green)
- `barStyle: 'solid'` - Single solid color

**Display Options:**
- `valueFormat: 'percentage'` - Shows as "75%" (default)
- `valueFormat: 'fraction'` - Shows as "75/100"
- `label` - Optional label text
- `showRange` - Show min/max values

**Component Arguments:**
Progress components support `@showValue` argument (default: true):
- `@showValue={{true}}` - Show internal text/labels (default)
- `@showValue={{false}}` - Show only the shape without internal text

**Size Control (CSS Custom Properties):**
Control sizing via scoped styles:
```css
.my-field {
  --progress-bar-height: 1.5rem; /* For bars */
  --progress-circle-size: 160px; /* For circles */
  --progress-circle-stroke-width: 12; /* Circle thickness */
  --progress-circle-value-size: 2rem; /* Internal text size */
}
```

**Color Thresholds (gradient style):**
- 0-25%: Red (destructive)
- 25-50%: Orange (warning) 
- 50-75%: Yellow (caution)
- 75-100%: Green (success)

This field consolidates the functionality of the previous progress-bar and progress-circle fields.
